ProductInfo.Features:
CUBOT P6: Android 4.2.2 OS + 1.2GHz MTK6572 Cortex-A7 Dual-core CPU + 512MB RAM + 4GB ROM, 5" capacitive multi-touch screen + 960 x 540 pixels screen resolution Up to 1080P resolution for horizontal/vertical auto-switchingly visual enjoyment
Support up to 8 MP photo output & FHD camcorder capability, WiFi/WiFi Hotspot Supports Google Navigation, built-in GPS navigation with A-GPS assisted
WiFi + Play Store + Google Maps + FM + Bluetooth 3.0 + Ebook + Email + Gmail + Messaging + Wallpapers + Calendar + Calculator + Clock + Alarm + Stop Watch + World Clock + Tasks + Flash Light + Camera + VPN + Tethering & Portable Hotspot
Supports APK format Android game and applications, such as Angry Birds, Tomcat and etc
Works with 3G(WCDMA 850/2100MHz) & 2G(GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz) networks
ProductInfo.Name: CUBOT P6 5.0" Capacitive Touch MTK6572 Dual Core Android 4.2.2 Unlocked Phone 8MP 512MB RAM 4GB ROM 3G WiFi
